sentences.en: A. Our omelette is served with a green vegetable.
sentences.cn: 我们的煎蛋卷和青菜一起端上.

sentences.en: Don't ask me how to make an omelette; cooking isn't my metier.
sentences.cn: 可别问我怎么摊鸡蛋, 烹饪不是我的专长.

sentences.en: Don't ask me how to make omelette; cooking isn't my metier.
sentences.cn: 可别问我怎么摊鸡蛋, 烹饪不是我的专长.

sentences.en: He stabbed at the omelette with his fork.
I can easily whip up an omelette.
sentences.cn: 我马上就能做好煎蛋卷.

sentences.en: Making an omelette is easy once you've got the knack ( of it ).
sentences.cn: 一旦你掌握了煎蛋饼的技巧,做起来就很容易了.

sentences.en: Only they could decide the winner of the inaugural omelette World Cup.
sentences.cn: 对于“煎蛋世界杯”来说,他们就是最高权威.

sentences.en: Place the omelette under a gentle grill until the top is set.
sentences.cn: 将煎蛋饼放在烤架下用文火烘烤，直到表面凝固。

sentences.en: There was soup, an omelette or something, coffee and light wine.
sentences.cn: 有一道汤, 一道蛋卷或别的什么菜, 还有咖啡和淡酒.

sentences.en: This delicious variation on an omelette is quick and easy to prepare.
sentences.cn: 这种稍加变化的可口煎蛋卷做起来又快又容易。

sentences.en: Use extra vegetables to bulk up the omelette.
sentences.cn: 再加些蔬菜使煎蛋看上去量更大。

sentences.en: You can not make an omelette without breaking eggs.
sentences.cn: 不先打破鸡蛋,蛋饼做不成;有失才有得;不付代价达不到目的.

sentences.en: You cannot make an omelet , omelette without breaking eggs.
sentences.cn: 你没打蛋就不能煎蛋卷.

trans.tran_cn: 煎蛋卷，摊鸡蛋，鸡蛋饼（常加入奶酪、肉和蔬菜等）
trans.tran_en: eggs mixed together and cooked in hot fat, sometimes with other foods added
